column4: josh, about 1 hour ago chili5000 made a suggestion of a link for me regarding this very driver issue.  my system crapped out and cannot find it.  do you have a history of this site?
anyone have a history of this room going back at least an hour? looking for a link chili555 (?) gave me
this message? 11:58 < chili555> jon5000, see http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1419368&highlight=4318  See post #6. I might know that guy!
